scripts.say: Though her struggle was futile from the beginning, she was a warrior who fought until the very end.
Sisters of the Royal Navy! The battle against Scharnhorst has ended in victory for us! However...
I hope that any of thee who are ever called upon to fight against an opponent many times superior, will fight as gallantly as Scharnhorst fought today!
All right, girls. 'tis time to go home... There are still combat operations to be carried out.
I'm no longer receiving Scharnhorst's identification signal from the testing area.
Hmm, so it's just like back then with the Z Fleet... Giving her even more power doesn't affect the outcome.
But there's one thing that caught my interest.
The second Royal Navy convoy heading for the Northern Union was sunk by planes.
On the current settings, Iron Blood shouldn't have the strength to launch an aerial attack... So how could this happen...
According to the script... Next up, the Royal Navy should be the ones launching a large-scale aerial attack.
In light of this information, we will have to observe them even more closely.
We're leaving the North Sea in your hands, Purifier.
Ahahahaha! Yay, it's finally my turn!
And if "she" gets in the way... Ahaha, well, you already know what to do.
Of course! Oh, I'm going to have so much fun out there! Ahahahahahaha!
